_header: Saint Bernard sayeth in his Book
Note: Essentially the same as 5215 without the two introductory stanzas.
_description: St. Bernard on Man’s three Foes — thirty-six 6-line stanzas (aabccb)

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Bernard seiþ in his BokÞat Mon is worm & wormes
                    Cok…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…And þat we mote þi sone seenWorld wiþ outen
                    ende. AMEN.
